title: Hextech Crafting Bug
body:
I just downloaded the alpha and when I look over the "loot" page, when I am looking at "all items", the pictures of the shards and materials are not showing up. However, when I go to the specific champions loot or skins loot, the pictures show up. 

Besides this, the alpha looks really good! I run my computer on very low settings so this may be why the pictures aren't showing up.

replies.body:
Glad to hear you are liking it!

The problem might be the same bug described here:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/KJ9RQR2b-having-trouble-seeing-champion

If not, let us know.
I received nothing upon opening a hextech crafting crate please help am I lagging or is this a bug?
